## ğŸ§ª Planned Nmap Commands

```powershell
nmap -sn <DC01-IP>
nmap -sS <DC01-IP> -p 1-1024
nmap -sV <DC01-IP>
nmap -A <DC01-IP>   # (optional aggressive scan)
ğŸ” Useful Wireshark Filters
Purpose	Filter
ICMP (ping traffic)	icmp
SYN packets (port scan)	tcp.flags.syn == 1 and tcp.flags.ack == 0
Reset responses	tcp.flags.reset == 1
Traffic to/from DC01	ip.addr == <DC01-IP>
DNS traffic	dns
SMB traffic	smb
